name: Mariah's World
overview: Follow the life of singer Mariah Carey as she begins her “The Sweet Sweet Fantasy” Tour around Europe and plans to get married.

episodes.name: For Love of the Tour
episodes.overview: Mariah plans her upcoming nuptials to James Packer and her first world tour in a decade. Mariah must race the clock to showtime and entrust the tour at the hands of her new manager, Stella.

episodes.name: Bone of Contention
episodes.overview: A grueling tour schedule presents obstacles for Mariah, who does her best to establish a comfortable home base in London for the twins. Meanwhile, two of Mariah's closest friends pull her into the middle of a heated disagreement.

episodes.name: Crossing Borders
episodes.overview: Mariah arrives late to a show due to an unknown time zone change. Stella re-assesses her strategy with the team after a press leak. Stella reluctantly rehires Mariah’s former hairdresser.

episodes.name: Mimi's Anniversary
episodes.overview: Mariah makes special memories for her kids and opens up about her past. Molly disappears in Stella’s time of need. Tanaka lights a match with MC when he jumps out of her anniversary cake.

episodes.name: Catching Feelings
episodes.overview: Mariah spends quality time with her road family in Lake Como, and Tanaka struggles to keep his feelings platonic. Tanaka suffers an unexpected injury that could send him home.

episodes.name: The Show Must Go On
episodes.overview: Mariah mourns the loss of her good friend Prince. In other developments, two injured dancers cause Mariah to consider simplifying the show, but Anthony is against the idea. Later, a heartbroken Tanaka realizes his relationship with Mariah was a fantasy.

episodes.name: Got Me Feeling Emotions
episodes.overview: As the European leg of the world tour concludes, emotions peak, and Mariah is relieved to find out her backup singer and best friend MaryAnne finally has forgiven Anthony, her co-creative director.
